I am an [Urban Studies Foundation Postdoctoral Research Fellow](https://www.urbanstudiesfoundation.org/) at the University of Oxford.

As an urban and economic geographer, my research interests lie at the intersection of financial geography, urban studies and economic sociology.

My current project explores how digital technologies reshape urban housing markets and renew mechanisms of segregation and inequalities, focusing on post-apartheid South Africa.
